entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
